name: BetterMap
description: Enhance your world exploration with saved map data, customizable zoom, waypoints, shared mapping, and performance-optimized rendering.
author: HyMods Team

name: CobbleGens
description: The Cobble Generators mod adds a new machine that passively produces cobblestone over time! This mod requires the Spellbook plugin! Things will not work as expected if you don't install it.
author: HyMods Team

name: levelTools
description: Level up your tools when broken! Like a muscle!!!
author: HyMods Team

name: RPG Leveling And Stats/Skills
description: RPG Leveling turns Hytale into a true RPG with XP, levels, zones, scaling difficulty, and stat progression. Earn balanced XP, choose Easyâ€“Extreme modes, and spend points on Damage, Defense, Health, Stamina, and more. Includes HUD, GUI, and leaderboard.
author: HyMods Team

name: Spellbook
description: The Spellbook mod adds a magical spellcasting system to Hytale, allowing players to learn, customize, and cast spells using a spellbook interface. Features include spell creation, mana management, and visual effects.
author: HyMods Team

name: Lucky Mining
description: Get more ores from mining, the more you mine in a row, the more ores you get.
author: HyMods Team

name: Overstacked
description: The Overstacked mod increases the max stack size of several commonly used items to be higher. It also offers a powerful config system that allows you to modify the max stack size of any item in the game!
author: HyMods Team

name: Simply Trash
description: Adds a trash can to easily destroy items!
author: HyMods Team

name: Vein Mining
description: Instantly mine connected ores and blocks by holding the Walk key (LEFT ALT) while breaking a single block.
author: HyMods Team

name: MultipleHUD
description: This simple mod allows modders to have mutliple HUD elements on the screen. Currently you can only have 1 Custom UI HUD Element on the screen but this mods adds a Custom UI HUD wrapper that adds multiple elements into one.
author: HyMods Team

name: MMO Skill Tree
description: (Multiple Languages) MMO Skill Tree adds an RPG-style progression system where every action you take helps you grow stronger.
author: HyMods Team

name: Aures - Horse Skins
description: Adds a random variations for horses! Also slightly changes the model and animations of horses.
author: HyMods Team

name: Gravestones
description: The Gravestone mod keeps your hard earned loot safe when you die in Hytale!
author: HyMods Team
